attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. reduce Stamp Duty by 50%.
2. raise the VAT threshold to £500,000.
3. all VAT returns to be submitted on a monthly basis with accompanying payment within seven days. In the event of failure to do so, the tax payer should be required to lodge a deposit equal to amount of the default failing which the VAT registration should be cancelled. In addition, in view of the default, Directors should be required to personally guarantee all debts to HMRC.

reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
